data.name: fox soldier
data.detailed_description:
A game that makes the locomotive so smooth, players can drive the motorcycle on the rough road, no matter it is any collision or rollover, it can be adjusted back to the original in time, and the experience is extremely comfortable, free running, and the joy of racing..
3D omnidirectional viewing angle, immersive gaming experience, unleash true self in a drastic battle.
Use the various weapons and resources available to defeat powerful monsters, and faith makes you fearless! Clear every level, let every corner of the world shout the Queen's name!
data.about_the_game:
A game that makes the locomotive so smooth, players can drive the motorcycle on the rough road, no matter it is any collision or rollover, it can be adjusted back to the original in time, and the experience is extremely comfortable, free running, and the joy of racing..
3D omnidirectional viewing angle, immersive gaming experience, unleash true self in a drastic battle.
Use the various weapons and resources available to defeat powerful monsters, and faith makes you fearless! Clear every level, let every corner of the world shout the Queen's name!
data.short_description: "FOXSOLDIER"is an action RPG hardcore sci-fi adventure game with multiplayer competition as the core.Only use the left and right buttons of the mouse to operate the 4 action systems of shooting, long sword, kung fu and locomotive.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit/Windows 8 64-bit/Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Inter Core i3-2100/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060/AMD Radeon rx 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
